tiles.caption: Two Worlds, Two Sides
tiles.text: In Alchimalia there were two worlds at war. Lunaria — the rabbits’ planet, with carrot fields and burrows. Ketis — the cats’ planet, ruled by an emperor. Borders were cold and bridges were broken.

tiles.caption: Emperor Pufus Alchimus
tiles.text: On Ketis ruled Emperor Pufus Alchimus, a warrior famed for conquests. The war with the rabbits had lasted long, and weapons spoke louder than stories.

tiles.caption: The Curious Son
tiles.text: A son was born to the emperor: Puf-Puf Alchimus. His father wanted a fighter. But Puf-Puf loved mathematics, playing with the elements, and dreamed of alchemy. More explorer than soldier.

tiles.caption: Friends Across the Border
tiles.text: Even in wartime, friendship found a way. A black rabbit and a white cat met in secret and shared their worlds. They didn’t look like enemies. They looked like curious kids.

tiles.caption: The Stone from Lunaria
tiles.text: One day on Ketis, Puf-Puf caught them gazing at a green stone brought from Lunaria, gleaming like an emerald. “Keep our friendship secret and the stone is yours,” whispered the rabbit. Puf-Puf promised.

tiles.caption: The Green-Golden Elixir
tiles.text: With the stone, Puf-Puf brewed an elixir. When it touched metal, the metal turned to gold. Great joy! He shared the elixir with his friends — tiny sips, lots of laughter.

tiles.caption: A Nap Under the Tree
tiles.text: Tired, they fell asleep under a very tall tree. The elixir slowly seeped into the roots. The green stone warmed the earth with a gentle light.

tiles.caption: Cat-Rabbit
tiles.text: When they woke, a strange, beautiful being stood beside them: the Cat-Rabbit — with a cat’s grace and a rabbit’s gentleness. It looked at them without fear.

tiles.caption: The Choice for Peace
tiles.question: The stone, the elixir, and the friendship have summoned the Cat-Rabbit. To keep the peace, what do you do first?

answers.text: Tell the truth about the friendship.
Share only as much elixir as helps.
Plant a peace tree in both worlds.

tiles.caption: Message of Peace
tiles.text: “I carry the peace between worlds,” said the Cat-Rabbit. “From friendship, stone, and elixir a bridge was born. Wars fade when you learn to mix things well.” Puf-Puf understood that alchemy is not only about metals, but also about hearts.

tiles.caption: Puf-Puf’s Decision
tiles.text: That day, Puf-Puf chose his path: explorer and alchemist. He would seek ways between worlds, not wars. And the Cat-Rabbit would become, someday, the sign that peace can be made, not only found.
